entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
